function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption of disease prevention programs due to focus on COVID-19","Impact":"Increase in cases of other diseases such as malaria, yellow fever, and others","Mitigation":"Allocate resources specifically for non-COVID-19 disease prevention","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, data analytics for disease tracking","People":"Public in developing countries, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government health ministries, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Economic shutdown leading to small business closures and unemployment","Impact":"Loss of livelihood, economic instability","Mitigation":"Financial aid to small businesses, job creation programs","Technologies":"Economic forecasting tools, small business support platforms","People":"Small business owners, employees, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government economic agencies, business associations"},{"Description":"Increased likelihood of conflicts within and across borders","Impact":"Threat to global peace and security","Mitigation":"Diplomatic interventions, conflict resolution efforts","Technologies":"Peacekeeping technologies, diplomatic communication platforms","People":"Global population, international diplomatic agencies","Owner":"United Nations, international diplomatic organizations"}]}
